commentText: Sets the same host setting.  {@code true} if allocating the same shard copy to the same host_should not be allowed, even when multiple nodes are being run on the same host.  {@code false}_otherwise.
codeText: private void setSameHost(boolean sameHost) {_        this.sameHost = sameHost__    }
